# Teste de ADD, SUB, AND, OR, XOR, ZERO

address 0

# ADD r3 = r1 + r2
00000001000000010000001000000011

# SUB r4 = r1 - r2
00000010000000010000001000000100

# AND r5 = r1 & r2
00000111000000010000001000000101

# OR r6 = r1 | r2
00000101000000010000001000000110

# XOR r7 = r1 ^ r2
00000100000000010000001000000111

# ZERO r8 = 0
00000011000000000000000000001000

# HALT
11111111111111111111111111111111
